scripts.deploy: npm run build:nft && cd nft && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:nft && npm run build:ft
scripts.build:nft: cd nft && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:ft: cd tokenized-item && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:nft && cd integration-tests && cargo run --example integration-tests "../nft/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm"
